id.description: ID of the record you are acting upon.

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

fields.description:
The 'fields' parameter allows API users to specify the fields they want to include in the API response. If this parameter is not present, the API will return all available fields. If this parameter is present, only the fields specified in the comma-separated string will be included in the response. Nested properties can also be requested by using a dot notation.

Example: `fields=name,email,addresses.city`

In the example above, the response will only include the fields "name", "email" and "addresses.city". If any other fields are available, they will be excluded.

$ul: **data**
**active**: The active status of the contact.
**addresses**
**birthday**: The birthday of the contact.
**company_id**: The company the contact is associated with.
**company_name**: The name of the company the contact is associated with.
**created_at**: The creation date of the contact.
**current_balance**: The current balance of the contact.
**custom_fields**
**custom_mappings**: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.
**department**: The department of the contact.
**description**: The description of the contact.
**email_domain**
**emails**
**fax**: The fax number of the contact.
**first_call_at**: The first call date of the contact.
**first_email_at**: The first email date of the contact.
**first_name**: The first name of the contact.
**gender**: The gender of the contact.
**id**: Unique identifier for the contact.
**image**
**language**: language code according to ISO 639-1. For the United States - EN
**last_activity_at**: The last activity date of the contact.
**last_name**: The last name of the contact.
**lead_id**: The lead the contact is associated with.
**lead_source**: The lead source of the contact.
**middle_name**: The middle name of the contact.
**name**: Full name of the contact.
**owner_id**: The owner of the contact.
**phone_numbers**
**photo_url**: The URL of the photo of a person.
**prefix**: The prefix of the contact.
**social_links**
**status**: The status of the contact.
**suffix**: The suffix of the contact.
**tags**
**title**: The job title of the contact.
**type**: The type of the contact.
**updated_at**: The last update date of the contact.
**websites**
**operation**: Operation performed
**resource**: Unified API resource name
**service**: Apideck ID of service provider
